textPlain: Very sorry for your loss. I see he has a Wikipedia page.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Irby

I do not know you, nor did I know your uncle.  Nevertheless he was an influence on you and I'm sorry for your loss. May you walk in his light.https://writersalmanac.publicradio.org/index.php%3Fdate=2012...
Growing up hearing about the legendary work at Xerox PARC was inspiring to me, especially in the Midwest where there wasn’t a lot of tech. RIP.
